traits.title: Design is just as important as the code
traits.quote: We spend so much time writing beautiful code and top-notch algorithms, the UI deserves just as much respect.

hobby.intro: What do I do in my free time?
title: Obviously
I have other hobbies too
hobby.subtitle: And they come in handy

hobbies.title: Aviation
hobbies.description: My passion for aviation reflects an appreciation for complex systems, precision, and safety. I understand the importance of structure—and when rules are not meant to be bent.

hobbies.title: Music
hobbies.description: On the other hand, enhances my ability to think creatively and recognize patterns across senses. I often work intuitively and fast once I sense the bigger picture.

hobbies.title: Hiking
hobbies.description: Hiking builds patience and endurance, skills I rely on when solving complex problems and staying focused through long development processes.

intro.title: Hi,  I’m Deyan - a full stack developer who turns ideas into polished digital products
intro.subtitle: From GO backend and React UIs to Swift-driven apps, I write code that feels fast, reliable and I experiment different practices and designs.

resume.title: This is what I have been doing

school.title: Education
school.name: AP in Computer Science
school.school: Copenhagen School of Design and Technology

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: Built a real-time multiplayer Tic Tac Toe game with a .NET backend and React frontend. Implemented SignalR for websockets, AI opponent logic, and custom API endpoints. Focused on learning full-stack architecture and real-time communication.

projects.title: URL Shortener
projects.description: Created a minimal and efficient URL shortener with a Go backend and React frontend. Used GIN, GORM, and CORS middleware. Built API endpoints and a responsive UI using Axios and MUI.

projects.title: Rubberduck
projects.description: Working on both frontend and backend for an internal admin dashboard. Using React, Redux, and TypeScript with a component library in Storybook. Integrated a headless CMS, implemented i18n, authentication, and local storage solutions.

projects.title: Tempustally
projects.description: Developed a professional time-tracking app from scratch for a Spanish consulting firm. Backend in Go with JWT authentication, REST API, middleware, and SQL. Frontend built in Vue with Axios and a responsive UI. Delivered a stable MVP used internally.

projects.title: Bilvask
projects.description: Developed an iOS app using Swift and Firebase for a car detailing company. The app was built for internal use and handled bookings, contact info, and service overview. Focused on delivering a functional and user-friendly interface using UIKit.
